member.name: T:LogoFX.Client.Bootstrapping.Adapters.Contracts.IBootstrapperAdapter
member.summary: Represents an adapter of an IoC container to the Caliburn.Micro required IoC functionality

member.name: M:LogoFX.Client.Bootstrapping.Adapters.Contracts.IBootstrapperAdapter.GetInstance(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Resolves an instance of required service by its type

member.name: M:LogoFX.Client.Bootstrapping.Adapters.Contracts.IBootstrapperAdapter.GetAllInstances(System.Type)
member.summary: Resolves all instances of required service by its type

member.name: M:LogoFX.Client.Bootstrapping.Adapters.Contracts.IBootstrapperAdapter.BuildUp(System.Object)
member.summary: Resolves instance's dependencies and injects them into the instance
member.param: Instance to get injected with dependencies
